content.raw:
I mentioned it in couple issues that it is strange, that nobody tested in “Virtual STIX” world. For me it failed couple times even to start the simulation \(see Terminated - Error: InitializationFailed, #231\). With version “ver23stix” is started but not last for long:

‌

```
M:\git\osgar>python -m osgar.logger --stream rosmsg.origin --times e:\md\tmp\ver
23stix\B\aws-zmq-subt-x2-191007_212720.log
0:00:01.939904 22 [b'B30F40F100F400R', 2.000328, -1.000148, -0.368793, 1.7e-05,
4.5e-05, 0.000197, 1.0]
0:00:03.112764 22 [b'B30F40F100F400R', 2.000329, -1.000149, -0.368793, 1.7e-05,
4.5e-05, 0.000197, 1.0]
```

so the X coordinate of 2nd robot is positive?! The robot tried to turn to north, which then has sense …

I mentioned it in couple issues that it is strange, that nobody tested in “Virtual STIX” world. For me it failed couple times even to start the simulation (see Terminated - Error: InitializationFailed, #231). With version “ver23stix” is started but not last for long:

‌

M:\git\osgar>python -m osgar.logger --stream rosmsg.origin --times e:\md\tmp\ver
23stix\B\aws-zmq-subt-x2-191007_212720.log

so the X coordinate of 2nd robot is positive?! The robot tried to turn to north, which then has sense …
